solution_line_template: He was carrying {tom_weight}*{hand_multiplier}=<<{tom_weight}*{hand_multiplier}={hand_weight}>>{hand_weight} kg in each hand
So he had {hand_weight}*{hands_count}=<<{hand_weight}*{hands_count}={total_hand_weight}>>{total_hand_weight} kg in his hands
So he had a total of {total_hand_weight}+{vest_weight}=<<{total_hand_weight}+{vest_weight}={total_weight}>>{total_weight} kg he was moving
